oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A PC-BASED MULTIRESOLUTION SPECTROGRAPH
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: THOMAS, TG
PANDEY, PC
AGASHE, SD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: spectrogram
speech processing
multiresolution spectrograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A spectrogram is a visual representation of the temporal variation of the component frequencies of dynamic signals like those associated with speech, biomedical phenomena, underwater sounds and Doppler ultrasound signals. Here we describe a PC-based spectrograph which, in addition to the facility of generating spectrograms with specified frequency resolution, also incorporates the ''combined'' spectrogram that can obtain good time and frequency resolutions simultaneously. Readouts from the spectrogram can be obtained directly from the PC monitor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE INSTITUTION OF ELECTRONICS AND TELECOMMUNICATION ENGINEERS, 40(2-3), 105-108
